column4: Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year (Col.4)
column9: Cases not Investigated U/S 157(1) (b) of Cr.PC (Col.9)
column10: Final Report - True but Insufficient Evidence (Col.10)
column14: Final Report - Total (Col.14) = (Col.10 + Col.11+ Col.12+ Col.13)
column15: Cases in which Chargesheets were Submitted (Col.15)
column16: Total Cases Disposed off by Police (Col.16) = (Col.8+ Col.9+ Col.14+ Col.15)
column17: Cases Pending Investigation at the End of the Year (Col.17) = (Col. 6 - (Col.7 + Col.16))
